//mapper_comment: Parameter can be either: tanoti or bowtie2
//tanoti_stringency_1_comment: Mapping stringency to use in the first mapping against all references
//tanoti_stringency_2_comment: Mapping stringency to use in the second mapping against specific references
//minAgensRead_comment: Minimum number of reads mapping to the agent to be considered a positive sample
//kraken_all_comment: PlusPFP database compiled by Ben Langmead on 9. December 2022
//kraken_focused_comment: NCBI Hepacivirus genomes with HCV genotypes from NCBI added|
//blast_db_comment: Custom set of HCV fasta files representing different genotypes. 2k1b recombinant added.
